front.title: A Data Center Profile for Software Defined Networking (SDN)-based IPsec

abstract.t: This document presents two profiles for configuring IPsec within a data center using an SDN controller and the YANG model described in the sdn-ipsec draft. Two profiles are described to allow both the IKE and IKE-less cases because some data centers may be required to use a standardized method of key exchange rather than SDN.
